title: Can i sue Fema for wrongfull garnishment?
question: I was given disaster relief money from fema for my house burning in Harris Fire. Many years later they garnished my wages to repay the amount with interest. Paying back double. Is there anything that can be done. I finished garnishment about 2 years ago.
answers: So if you had to repay this, why was this wrongful?
